com.salimov.yurii

Class Spiral

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.Spiral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISpiral

    public class Spiral
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpiral
    The class describes a method for getting a spirally twisted array of digits.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuriy Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
